channel.title: Which server download is the best for a beginner?
channel.description:
Ok, I have downloaded a couple of servers, I am not sure which one is best for me, I am a beginner. I kind of understand them.
I have downloaded
TestScape Source Server Starter Pack V1 Hosphin Client Untouched 2.5 Pimpscape
I am mostly using Untouched 2.5, Server Starter Pack v1, and pimpscape. Which one should I use? I am following the guide at this link http://frugooscape.net/smf/index.php/topic,524.0.html
I just want to know which is easiest to code and learn to run a server! Thanks, Terrorizer

item.title: Which server download is the best for a beginner?
item.dc:creator: @Jack_coderz Jack coderz
item.description:
@Jack_coderz wrote:

Definitley testscape once you got the hang of it you may wish to go to stuff like for example:
phonescape(another basic apart from edited)
Zdiddyscape(tricky might need to learn a bit)
Horror moss
Project ripzone pk
united pk

Happy to help

Read full topic
item.source: Which server download is the best for a beginner?

item.title: Which server download is the best for a beginner?
item.dc:creator: @aerozero94 aerozero94
item.description:
@aerozero94 wrote:

TestScape source is best for now, then work your way up when you think you can work on a different source.

Read full topic
item.source: Which server download is the best for a beginner?
